work.title: Assistant Vice President (Software Developer)
work.duties: Architected and developed mobile/desktop applications (Goal Explorer, Understanding Your Life, Wealth Outlook, Investor Personality Assessment, Client 360) using JavaScript, TypeScript, AngularJS, HTML5, CSS3, Test Driven Development, agile methodologies. Mentored new developers in a lead developer role. Worked across multiple teams to collaborate and accomplish development tasks. Introduced Grunt, browserify, and flux to the company through use in projects. Rapid prototype development using agile software methodology.

work.title: Web Developer
work.duties: Custom Wordpress development. PHP/Javascript/SQL/Ruby/HTML/CSS web application development. This job brought me my first experience with using git, and doing web development in a Linux/OS X environment.

work.title: Web Developer
work.duties: Assisted with frequent updates to township website. Worked primarily in NetObjects Fusion.

work.title: IT Support Technician
work.duties: Worked in company IT help center installing operating systems on employee machines and troubleshooting hardware problems. Assisted with upgrading specific types of printers throughout the company. Helped to organize company inventory room, saving company money through refurbishment of old equipment.

work.title: Intern
work.duties: Helped with updates to company intranet website in Dreamweaver. Assisted with project to migrate database servers.

projects.title: ruscello
projects.description: A simple boilerplate listing New York Times Best Sellers. Scrapes data from New York Times website using node + cheerio. Uses latest TypeScript, React and Redux.

projects.title: At the Drive-In
projects.description: A searchable streaming torrent movie and TV show app built using React and Redux.

projects.title: randUM
projects.description: An iOS React Native app to search for and stream music from the archive.org website
